wordpressPost.title: Riding into May
wordpressPost.content:
It has now been over a month since we launched the Stryde app and we could not be more excited to be shipping our first Stryde bikes this week! Thank you so much for letting us into your homes. We hope you’ve enjoyed riding with us as much as we’ve enjoyed riding with you!

Thank you also for the feedback you’ve sent our way, please keep it coming! It is our goal to make your experience better and better every day. You can always message your favorite studio or instructor directly, send us a message on social media or e-mail at help@strydebike.com.

Here are some changes we’ve made to the app over the past month:

– We’ve added an icon to show which classes you’ve already taken. We have improved the way classes are displayed to make finding your favorite and newest rides easier.

– We’ve added brand new THEME RIDES! Thank you for all the new theme ride suggestions, we have many more dropping, including a few later today!

-We’ve also added a workout history function on the web app, so you can see how awesome you’ve been. Coming soon, a way to tell which rides have a weights section.

Oh, and one more thing. We’d love to see your home set-up! Tag us #strydebike

Thank you, and stay safe!
